```{r}

min_max_fonk <- function(a,min_new,max_new){
  x = a - min(a)
  y = max(a)-min(a)
  norm = (x/y)*(max_new-min_new)+min_new
  return(norm)
}

```


```{r}

age <- c(13, 15, 16, 16, 19, 20, 20, 21, 22, 22, 25, 25, 25, 25, 30, 33, 33, 35, 35, 35, 35, 36, 40, 45, 46, 52, 70)

min_max_fonk(age,0,1)

```
